eventDecorators.name: ClaimReward
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user withdraws tokens.

eventDecorators.name: DepositDynamicReward
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user withdraws tokens.

eventDecorators.name: DepositFixedReward
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user withdraws tokens.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user withdraws tokens.

eventDecorators.name: StakeTokens
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user withdraws tokens.

eventDecorators.name: UnstakeTokens
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user withdraws tokens.

eventDecorators.name: WithdrawFixedReward
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user withdraws tokens.

functionDecorators.name: allocateDynamicReward
functionDecorators.description: Step 2 - each week, an off-chain process will call this function to allocate the rewards to the staked wallets A robust mechanism is required to be sure all addresses are allocated funds and that the allocation matches the tokens previously deposited (in step 1) Multiple calls may be made per round if necessary (e.g. if the arrays grow too big).

parameterDecorators.name: _amounts
parameterDecorators.description: [] Number of tokens to deposit in basic units (n * 10**decimals).

parameterDecorators.name: _totalAmount
parameterDecorators.description: total number of tokens to Allocate in this call.

functionDecorators.name: claim
functionDecorators.description: Claim all outstanding rewards from the contract.

functionDecorators.name: depositDynamicReward
functionDecorators.description: owner Deposit deposit of dynamic reward for later Allocation.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Number of tokens to deposit in basic units (n * 10**decimals).

functionDecorators.name: depositFixedReward
functionDecorators.description: Team deposit of the Fixed staking reward for later distributionThis transfer is intended be done once, in full, before the commencement of the staking period.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Number of tokens to deposit in basic units (n * 10**decimals).

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setRewardStartTime
functionDecorators.description: Initiates the reward generation period. contract & rewards finish "rewardLifetime" after this.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Number of tokens to stake in basic units (n * 10**decimals).

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: unstake
functionDecorators.description: Unstake tokens from the contract. Unstaking will also trigger a claim of all allocated rewards. remaining tokens after unstake will accrue rewards based on the new balance.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Number of tokens to stake in basic units (n * 10**decimals).

functionDecorators.name: withdrawFixedReward
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw unused Fixed reward tokens, deposited at the beginning of the contract period.Withdrawal is allowed only after the contract period has elapsed and then only allow withdrawal of unallocated tokens.
